div.p: An indicator that the first PERSON in the PERSON RELATIONSHIP is a lead contact to the second PERSON.

That is the PERSON acting as a lead contact or proxy for the other PERSON, in circumstances where the second PERSON is unable to communicate effectively or lacks the capacity to make medical decisions and the proxy is authorised to act for that PERSON. This may be the case if the PERSON requiring a lead contact is an infant, has a disability or has an illness preventing direct communication.
